posts.content:
Hello World!
Environment My previous blog platform: WordPress on BandWagon Host
 high maintainance cost: php, sqldb, virtual host vps is not free, though cheap  Current: Hugo + Github
 free! Golang is promising. I'm learning it by doing it  hugo new site [path] git clone [any hugo theme] hugo new posts/any.md hugo serve -D Deploy Using git submodle to make built files pointed to a different origin
git submodule add -b master git@github.com:<USERNAME>/<USERNAME>.github.io.git public
